'''1.21.40.1''' is the first Preview version of [[Minecraft Education 1.21.90]], released on November 13, 2024, which adds features from the '''[[Bundles of Bravery]]''' drop.<ref>{{citation|url=https://edusupport.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360047556451-Minecraft-Education-Change-Log|title=Minecraft Education Change Log|website=edusupport.minecraft.net|author=Justin}}</ref>

== Additions ==
{{main|Bedrock Edition 1.21.20|Bedrock Edition 1.21.30|Bedrock Edition 1.21.40}}
* Added features from [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.20]] to [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.40]], '''[[Bundles of Bravery]]'''.</onlyinclude>
** Except [[hardcore]] mode.
